website_summaries.verdict: Designed for pet owners thanks to the useful components and decent suction power. We think it's worth considering despite occasional quirks.
pros: Dual tanks are simple to fill and empty
Has dual brush bars that tackle pet debris, stains, and odours
cons: Quality control issues like missing pieces are common
Reports of leaks from the back of the machine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often leave reviews. But I felt this needed a 5* review. Really simple to put together. Really simple to work. Pulls out so much dirt. I knew our carpet needed a clean due to our puppy having a couple of accidents. I was shocked how much dirt it actually got out! 🤮
customer_reviews.author: JaneioG

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Used our new one for the first time today and was amazed at how much better than our old 13-14 year old Vax it is. Very easy to set up and use and took a lot of pet hair from deep down in the carpet up which made a huge difference. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jess358

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items !!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with no handle and no screws for the waste water and clean water tanks . Very poor quality control from VAX. All items should have been in the box, I contacted VAX and they were really rude and told me i had to purchase the missing items baring in mind i have just paid a lot of money for this carpet cleaner. Now having to wait for items that were missing and had to pay again with no offer of reimbursement from VAX. Clearly someone isn't checking the boxes before dispatching.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I brought in ages
customer_reviews.text: We have a black lab , and this has been brilliant as he was recently quite poorly, thought it was going to be a insurance job as carpet was brand new , brought all the stains of it in 1 go x
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant carpet cleaner, so simple to use, easy to fill and empty the tanks, light to push around, long lead so no need to unplug and move about. The suction and cleaning action is simple but does a great job. Best of all it’s a very reasonable price. I had a very expensive Bissell carpet cleaner for years which was heavy and complicated to use, this cleaner is 100% better.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Leaks - don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: See video: Leaks from the back of the machine (Brad new our the box). Waste of money and now have mess about with Royal Mail for a return.
customer_reviews.author: SJ0nes

customer_reviews.title: All For The Want Of A Horse-shoe Nail
customer_reviews.text: Everything that should have been included in the box was there - bar the 3 screws to hold it all together! If I ever find 3 screws to fit, I'll let you know if it works OK.
customer_reviews.author: Woodhillian

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner but after a few uses leaking
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since September and used it a few times however today as you can see the water was leaking out to the electrical area. Such a shame as when it works it was fantastic. I’ll speak to Amazon tomo about this
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: WARNING. not safe leaks near electric compartment
customer_reviews.text: Read the other 1 star reviews too. We all say the same. This product leaks and goes into the electric compartment. Very dangerous. We sent back got full refund. The product needs to be recalled.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I went against other reviews about it leaking water from the back and thought I would try it for myself and guess what it poured water from the back tried a couple more times and still the same thing sent back just waiting for my refund
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Payze

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these because I have a new puppy that's not housetrained yet. It's fantastic, works exactly as advertised. I especially love the little spray head that comes with it, you can spray very difficult stains and leave them to soak for a while before using the main cleaner. My carpets haven't looked this good since I got them. The tanks are maybe a little on the small side, but one tank will do a good sized room up to twice over. If you're doing multiple rooms then do expect that you'll go through several tanks of water. But they're very easy to take out and empty/fill, so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Aralla

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 uses!!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner was amazing the first couple of times I used it. Then it stopped sucking the dirty water back up! Pretty gutted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: leaks onto electric motor
customer_reviews.text: We had to send this item back as the tank leaked onto the electric motor and caused the ciricuit board to trip. Other reviews state that it leaks too.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lovering

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to assemble (slot together + 3 screws), Cleans carpet well, Removes most of the moisture back out of the carpet, Good selection of accessories, Lightweight and moves easily, hooks to wrap power cable around for storage, Bag for accessories, Retail bottles of solution should lasts 19 (1.5l bottle) / 50 (4l bottle) full tanks. Cons: No measuring tool for solution, Not easy to get the pet hair that inevitably go up the suction slot out (even after vacuuming, can use a flat blunt object to hook them out), Sample bottle of solution only lasts about 4 full tanks. Overall, good unit, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Used and damaged when it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Box had been opened previously and a label inside stated that this had been tested with water for quality assurance. Who ever tested it had damaged it significantly and it had been glued back together. Item leaks terribly as whoever's disassembled it, broke the clips which secure it in place. Very very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy francis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to assemble this product. It is just as easy to use. It seems to clean up all of the dirt and pet dander and I could smell a difference when I stuck my nose to our carpet. The only thing that's a pain is the water tank isn't the biggest so I had to refill the clean and empty the dirty tanks 5 times just to do our small lounge. I can't wait to use the hose attachment though on our sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Get this Vax great value for money
customer_reviews.text: After searching and looking at reviews I bought this Vax. So if you want a carpet that is mid range and does the job this is the one. It comes with 2 Vax testers which are good for a few goes. I used a non vax carpet shampoo and it worked fine so it’s well worth the money. Best thing is has hose and attachment for dirt spots and sofa etc. One go and my carpets look great and it’s light enough to give your stair carpets a wash as well. I have cats so removal of fluff now and again during washing. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Saz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and easy to use but the water tank is too small and you need to add water very often. Result wasn’t something brilliant but also wasn’t that bad. I’ve received a faulty item so i’ve returned it. Water is slightly leaking for lower water tank and it was going into its electrical motor causing short circuit. So i’ve returned. Didn’t buy another one as i don’t think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It leaks water from the motor ,making it very dangerous, with the chance to electric shock
customer_reviews.author: mr john barnett

customer_reviews.title: Have a mop handy
customer_reviews.text: Water spurts out by the pivot from base to upright section. Tried to suck it up but the suction is so low I had to get the mop out. Carpet goes onto a wooden floor and the puddle it left on the wood was excessive. Had a few cleaners before and never had one leak like this. EDIT: Returned the unit after it completely soaked carpet at the bottom of the stairs. I was using the stair hose at the time. Also the stair hose WILL NOT reach to the top, it's actually quite short. EDIT: Second one is worse than the first, soaked the floor and visible leaks from the back. Enough, returned
customer_reviews.author: ChickyC

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to deal with the smell of the dog in our bedroom. My dog got into a habit of coming up into our bedroom, sleep on the carpet and then do her cleaning right there. It has left a residual dog smell. This carpet cleaner has dealt with it quickly and efficiently. It is easy to assemble once you know what you are doing. You need to follow the instructions for the first time with assembly and measuring of the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: All the features needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as it had all the capabilities I needed and doesn't disappoint. Nice and easy to assemble out of the box and I wash washing carpets in 15 mins. The main wash function does a great job and the small detail head allows you to complete the edges of the carpet which was the reason I bought this one over others in the range. Worth doing some research to check the price history of the item as it fluctuates a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly - but - the 4.2 litre water tank emptied onto the carpet in less than 90 seconds and the belt was not attached properly to the two brushes so they did not rotate and therefore I ended up with one very sodden rug. The build quality compared to my previous VAX carpet cleaner ( the old orange mode which I had for 7 years with no problem ) is inferior with cheap plastic used throughout. Amazon as always very understanding and have processed a complete refund on return.
customer_reviews.author: napoliman

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carpet cleaner for the money very easy to assemble and use fairly light weight , my carpet dried relatively quickly, my machine does not leak like some of the more expensive brands I have used it also has good suction and no streaking when used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Product leaks in to motor
customer_reviews.text: Product doing a good job at first until tripped my electrics looked over product water streams out of rear holes down to electric motor DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT DANGEROUS LEAKS LIKE A SIV see picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpets not rugs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. Make sure you pre vacuum the carpet with a normal vacuum first. Works great on carpets, water came out nice and black, doesn't work at all on a deep pile/Shaggy rug. I tried it on my rug first and was going to return it as it was collecting no water but as soon as I tried it on a normal carpet it worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and slow
customer_reviews.text: This wet vac is good at the price , but it is far too noisy if you have close neighbours . Not only that , but if you are using the (far too short) hose , the whole thing will keep tipping backwards , spilling dirty water all over the place . There is a button here that says "submit" - I will not , sir , I will not !
customer_reviews.author: toasty

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: On first use took a few tries to put water container in but once got the hang it was easy. Think because our carpet was so dirty due to the dog will need more than one attempt as the first go left it a bit streaky. I was amazed how much dirt it picked up, its not a 2 minute job need to take your time to do a good job. But very pleased with it, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mum of 3

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about buying this after reading some of the reviews but decided to try it and was not disappointed. Its very lightweight and easy to use and boy did it deep clean the carpets which was well needed after having workmen in and my dog having accidents in the lounge.
customer_reviews.author: debby betts

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about this as i had the smaller older vax. Used it today and despite the reviews it is absolutely brilliant. Did not realise how dirty carpet was. Brought mat up like new again as well. We have 2 cats as well. brilliant, easy to set up, runs fantastic, hope it keeps that way
customer_reviews.author: MR R C PELLEGRIN

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Did not wash evenly - It left brush marks. It only managed to suck up about 10% of dirty water. I gave away a 15 year old Vax that (apart from a broken handle) worked much better. I guess you get what you pay for and this is one of the cheaper models. Full marks to Amazon though for a prompt return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: New Man

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well once you master the trigger
customer_reviews.text: We brought this after our air conditioner leaked to clean the carpets and initially it left them wetter than expected. Another read of the manual showed me where I was going wrong. If you squeeze the trigger it pushes water out however if you don’t it doesn’t. Running the vax over a cleaned section without squeezing the trigger lifts up most the water
customer_reviews.author: P. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Rather disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a heavy duty carpet cleaner. It came with no instruction manual. I was disappointed when the fluff from the carpet jammed up the machine on the first use. I had vacuumed the carpet first before using the VAX. Once the fluff was blocked it was hard to remove it as I had to unscrew most pieces and reassemble with NO manual. I had to search YouTube for tutorials specifically to help me use this this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Fikile Dube

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in june, very good looking, very shiny. I have one cat so my carpet needed some help.. the product does the job, but the reason i give one star is because after 2 months black smoke came out of it, I contacted the Amazon thei send me another one that was on August. Now the second item broken again, water running out of it, black smoke, plus when i plugged it all my electricity in the house shots off. I got scared and again i contacted the amazon to return the item after one fully month of using it. Their issue an refund. So, i don't suggest to buy this product, it can be very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Denisa Bazga

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: I have found this cleaner very good. it is powerful and has made a real difference to my carpets. as I look after dogs for friends I have need of a carpet cleaner to make sure that my house does not smell 'doggy' and this has worked a treat
customer_reviews.author: rowena

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacment for much older model of Vax carpet cleaner, easy to use, no leakage so far. Very suprised to see how effective carpet cleaner is almost looks professionally cleaned. Only down side is the pipe for cleaning the stairs is pretty short i coulf only do 4 steps as there is no seperate attacment for the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing, great for the first two or three uses but I have tried again today (this being my fifth use) and the suction is now virtually non existent. I do have a busy household but with this being marketed as suitable for pets I expected a lot more. Unfortunately I am only weeks away from being out of my return date for this product so am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: avoid this model
customer_reviews.text: Kept leaking around the electrics (not good) and didn't suck up much water, so left the carpets very wet. TBF to VAX, they were quick to replace under warranty with another model which works much better that this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rabster

customer_reviews.title: Makes such a difference to our light coloured carpets.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a boon. I've had machines with rotating brushes but this is so much better. It is light and easy to use and because of this, it can be used more often.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Brawn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how easy this was to use. It is just like using my normal hoover. Not too heavy and very powerful. The clear duel tanks show how much water you are using and how much is dirty water is coming through. It doesn't leave the carpet soaking and cleans really well. The hand held spray is great. The tanks are easy to remove and clean. I think its fair to say I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: carol knight

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Should come with a safety warning!
customer_reviews.text: ** AVOID ** Do not easter your money and time setting this up! We ordered based on mixed reviews, my husband set it up and after 5 minutes of cleaning the carpet it tripped the electric. We tried again think it could be a coincidence and it tripped again, my husband then saw water leaking from the canister into the electric ports of the carpet cleaner. Everything was attached as stated in instructions. Amazon were helpful and arrange a return the next day and posted out a new machine. Which had the exact same problem. We have now returned both. Clearly a manufacturing issue, so dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my beat purchases ever. It was really easy to put together and ready to go in about 15 mins. It is a little light, even when full to get a really powerful suction on the back strokes, so we balanced some weights on the front. It really made a massive difference on all of the carpets I've used it on. Doing stairs can be a little labour intensive with the attachment tool, but great for upholstery and car seats. All around a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy W

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I was unfotunate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my hall carpet was getting messy due to a broken bin bag It worked well the first time but when the carpet dried if left a water mark round a particularly grubby area, possible user fault Decided to try the stain solution that can]me with it the following day and it started to leave black grains on the carpet, turned it off and it wouldn't start again, motor was buzzing so I suspect a broken belt, have returned it to Amazon. Once the refund is confirmed I may well re-order it as it is a great machine for a flat , was impressed with what it did before it went wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: When using this i have found that it sucks up very little water compared to what you have dispensed from the machine. When it appears to be no longer picking up water if you add a small amount of pressure with your foot you can see how much water is still in your carpet. Its easy to use but I feel it needs more weight on the hoover head to actually get all the dirty water out of the carpet. Would not recommend, wish I could return it now but had it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Mr N G Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, very easy to use and excellent at cleaning. Great value for money, certainly cheaper than buying new rug, which was something we thought about. Would certainly recommend this to anyone looking for a good value carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Works well but perhaps dangerous for electrics
customer_reviews.text: Seems to leak out of back of device and leaves some areas a bit too wet, but does clean well contacted seller and awaiting to see if they have any advice
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I put it together and filled the clean water butt ready for cleaning my carpets. Straight away it started leaking until in the end I had a big puddle in the dining room. Lucky it was on the linoleum and not the carpet. I havent been able to use it since and am waiting to send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Merc

customer_reviews.title: A good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Although this cleaner does a good job cleaning, it deposits bits due to low suction function. Also, cleaning the plastic cover is impossible and it does not detach. However, overall, it shampoos very efficiently and is light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shampooer. Having had nearly all the vax shampooers on the market, this is the best so far. No design faults at all, easy to assemble, very easy to clean, just rinse off the rollers with a jug of water when you've finished. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belt failed after 1 use. Leaks water out the back
customer_reviews.text: Used once, went to use second time and belt burnt out as soon as it was turned on. Also noticed water leaking out of holes in the back. No i didn't suck anything up to jam rollers and no I didn't tilt it back causing water to leak. Left a nice black stain on my carpet from the belt burning out. Requested refund.
customer_reviews.author: Macca

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing, recieved the product on time which was pleasing however it turned off all the electricity in the house everyone we use it and now it doesn't even turn on. Can't return it pass the returning date.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Zahid

customer_reviews.title: It dies a great job
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for the first time and carpet has come up as good as new really impressed - very easy to put together too
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Budget carpet cleaner does the job using recommended carpet shampoo and stain remover spray
customer_reviews.text: For a budget carpet cleaner this does the job, easy to use, very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Machine cuts out and trips fuses
customer_reviews.text: All good until it fused all electrics. It did this every 15-20 mins. Unfortunately vax want to see my proof of purchase which I do not have except amazon order and confirmation! Not able to forward that so very frustrated .........
customer_reviews.author: gad

customer_reviews.title: A must buy! Every home should invest in one
customer_reviews.text: Honestly 5* The value for money is crazy . It feels like it’s an industrial carpet cleaner for the home . I have two dogs , and one of them is a puppy . So lots of stains and smells . But with a magic wand it’s like I have new carpet again! Honestly a miracle
customer_reviews.author: Ivanna

customer_reviews.title: Leaking at the back where are the screws.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, suction acceptable, very easy to use and light , i started to like this product but in minutes of using it for the first time i noticed it started leaking from the back where are the screws. Amazon support team were helpful and will refund 100% the money once i sent it back. Overall i would rate it for a max 2 stars purely for the facts that is easy to assemble and is a light machine straight forward how to be used .
customer_reviews.author: Toma Ana Maria

customer_reviews.title: Effective carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use tool for cleaning carpets. I did find that it took a few hours for carpets to dry afterwards so suction power to remove excess water could be better. Effective at removing dirt leaving carpets looking clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Great results , check photo on a wool carpet !
customer_reviews.author: marius

customer_reviews.title: Revitalises the carpets
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works, only downside is having to keep stopping very regular to keep emptying the dirty tank and refilling the clean tank. Which does interfere but can't be helped. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Really easy to assemble (takes one screwdriver and about 2 minutes) and it really straightforward to use. I have had older models which are really complex to use but this is so easy. Carpets stay a bit damp after cleaning but that’s to be expected. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: M.G

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Easily put together and so easy to use. It brings carpets up lovely and dries off where shampooed not bone dry but does not leave soaking wet. I am impressed and worth money.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. There are pages and pages of unsatisfied customers on the VAX website. Mine was delivered yesterday and it leaked all over my carpet from every single hole in the machine. It is an extremely common problem and I would strongly advise you to not waste your money on a product that drowns your carpet before youve even started cleaning it. Check the website first to see the reviews. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: hovered with standard hoover as suggested in Vax instructions. so imagine my surprise when I saw the amount of dirt the Vax lifted. the whole room smells better for it. should of bought one yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: j h

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we only managed the pretreatment, before the motor started to smell and tripped our fuse box. Had to return and was then out of stock. We may have just been unlucky, with a faulty product. The machine was easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: P D James

customer_reviews.title: Does What It says on the tin cleaned my carpet perfect
customer_reviews.text: ECR2V1P It said to be 4.2 litres i have a pirex measureing jug full half a litre 5 measures will give you 2.5 litres and thats the Tank full not 4.2 litres as Addvertised maybe i have got it wrong The jug does say 500 half litre and my VAX DUAL POWER PET ADVANCE ECR2V1P NOT 4.2 litre BUT A 2.5 litre
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its great til it leaks and cuts out!!
customer_reviews.text: Having to return my Vax as it leaks water down the back and cuts out. If it didnt do that it would be pretty good really.... easy to assemble and use, just a dangerous pain in the butt !
customer_reviews.author: J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Worked once then died
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this cleaner it worked a few times but then the belt snapped which was replaced. After using it a second time it lost all suction and cut out. The internal water seals were nothing more than white window style sealant, electrics stuffed. Just outside of 12 month warranty too :( Never buying a vax product again, the build quality is awful. If your just cleaning carpets once a year go and rent one from any supermarket. Which is exactly what I'll be doing from now on....
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Worst carpet cleaner ever
customer_reviews.text: I received the carpet cleaner yesterday and I was very excited to try it. I was very disappointed. It doesn't work when it's tilted. All the dirty water comes out from behind, very very disappointed. It's not what is advertised. I will never try again
customer_reviews.author: alina serbenco

customer_reviews.title: Bad suction.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless. I've owned 3 Vax cleaners and this one is by far the worst carpet cleaner I've owned. The suction is non existent. I've used 7 tanks of clean solution and haven't even filled one dirty tank of water Yes, that means the fest is still in the carpet. Gutted as I'm getting a new sofa in a few days and wanted to clean and scotch guard my carpet before it came. Anyone that's happy with this steaming pile has never Owned a good one. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a lot of water in the carpet.
customer_reviews.text: A bit concerning i used two full tanks of water and the vacuum picked up about 1/10th of a 1 tank. So the remainder of the 2 tanks is in the carpets. I tried on two different carpets and it was the same.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and potentially lethal. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has some serious design flaws. The upright handle comes in three pieces which are screwed together and have poorly located water seals which allow water to run onto the electric motor. Thankfully I have circuit breakers otherwise I would have been electrocuted.
customer_reviews.author: James Randal

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have always used Vax carpet cleaners but unfortunately, our last one has gone to Vax Heaven with a broken motor shame you can't get replacements. Anyway, we had purchased this on and it cleaned the carpet so much better than the previous version which was a great deal more expensive. The twin scrubbing brushes work great and have revived our carpets and owning two dogs is a major achievement. So thank you very much Vax for a light and easy to use machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to use carpet washer
customer_reviews.text: Everything was in the box, the screws were in snap bags on the handle. The parts slid together easily and lined up with the holes. With 2 labradors and 3 cats I was expecting the carpets to be dirty but I was amazed at the amount of fur and dirt it removed. The washer was easy to move around. The only downside is cleaning the brushes and suction head as they are not removable without unscrewing the entire assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Grahame

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant, I could not believe how much dirt came up from my carpets. We have just got a new puppy and so as you can imagine there are a lot of mistakes and this has really helped with the smell and staining of my carpet
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and use and really pulls the dirt from carpets, light weight and easy to do stairs would highly recommend, ready to use in five minutes best machine ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carpet looks like new!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Instructions for use are very clear and easy to follow. So far I have only cleaned 1 bedroom carpet, as we have decorated, but am very impressed with how clean it came up after using this Vax Pet Advance Cleaner. I was amazed at how much dog hair it picked up as it washed, even though I had vacuumed before using it as advised. Can't wait to get started on the rest of the carpets!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Had this niw for one month and have used it 3 times. Very easy to assemble, very easy to use and was very impressed after the first use. I have done the the living room carpet, rug and sofas. Doesn't take long to get the job done. Always used at the end of the night and then just left overnight to dry
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good machine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Brought my carpets and sofa up amazingly, couldn’t believe how much dirt can be hiding in them! Great product. The wool rug I did came up great but as expected some of the fibres came out Of the carpet and got stuck around the brushes, not too difficult to remove without dismantling the whole thing but it did gather in it quite quickly. Would however definitely recommend this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: does the job, and eliminates pet odors ,, a lot better than that useless orange thing vax sells.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Vax carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Although the suction isn't the best it did the job. Much smaller capacity than our old Vax but much easier and lighter to use. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S M Iles

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use made my carpets look like new very happy with my vax
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic read the reviews and done were a little off putting but easy to put together,and not heavy so easy to use even with my Rheumatoid Arthritis so very highly recommended by this buyer. x
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant just what was needed does the job it’s made for
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it’s brill my carpets look fab fast drying and even did my mattresses with it gets get tough stains very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Rhys & Rebecca perkins

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do clean carpets and its left the carpets cleaned and deodorised little noisy but it's an an investment one worth buying
customer_reviews.author: MR B RUTTER

customer_reviews.title: I thought this is for dry and wet cleaning but it's not.
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product stated clearly that it is intended for dry cleaning (hoovering) and wet cleaning, so I bought this item assuming that I will be able to do both. But now I have to return the item because I am supposed to have a simple vacuum cleaner that gets carpets vacuumed and only after that I can use this one to wash the carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Evi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived 3 weeks early
customer_reviews.text: My parents swear by the one they have so ordered my own .... easy to assemble but Unable to write a review yet as this arrived 3 weeks ahead of schedule ..... so can’t fault it so far !!!
customer_reviews.author: Karl wenham

customer_reviews.title: Best Vax I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I wish i had bought this years ago its much easier to use than my old orange Vax 3 in 1. Because of my pets and my business I use this machine every week
customer_reviews.author: Justine Linden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs who like to pee on my rug and have 1 elderly cat who always has loose bowels and chooses to also poop on the rug! after spending money on a new rug every 2 months I decided to buy a carpet washer. The results are amazing got rid of the poop stains first try and now smells fresh as a daisy! highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Solomons

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really works fantasticly x easy to use and it was quite scery how much dirt came up lol but feel so much cleaner x
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Pet Vax
customer_reviews.text: It did what is said and picked up more dirt and pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Broomhall

customer_reviews.title: Grand-dogs and Bare-foot people!
customer_reviews.text: We have one of the first VAX carpet cleaners it still helps me with “wet” diy! I fancied a new easier to use machine to clean our carpets for moving home, it made sense to buy VAX again. We have grand-dogs and bare-foot people to clean up after and this machine works better than expected! Very pleased we bought VAX again...
customer_reviews.author: David Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The only downside is the machine tends to fall backwards when using the hose. A design fault.......
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. T. Parker

customer_reviews.title: clean carpets
customer_reviews.text: need to keep filling the water up and emptying the dirty water out .not enough capacity .BUT it gets the carpets clean so ill put up with that .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for refresh but not deep clean
customer_reviews.text: This is great for refreshing carpets but does not deep clean. I’ve had some urine soaked carpets to clean and despite going over them 4 times now it has not got rid of the smell although stains are much better. Good for the price but perhaps I should have gone for a more expensive and powerful model. Very easy to use and put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money easy to use and not that heavy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant want a fantastic hoover cleaner. The delivery driver was was super good very friendly and I thank him for his service
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use - like all carpet cleaners it's a bit tricky to clean head but would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: carrie ann

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of paying out to hire a machine. Really impressed brought my carpets up fab and didn’t leave them too wet. Easy to assemble and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Utterly awful product! DO NOT BUY!! Assembled and started to use...witching 1 meter we had smoke pouring out of it and it’s burnt our carpet beyond repair! Horrendous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bodkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It’s fab all round , Best Buy this year , worth the money . In some weird way I love seeing how much dirt it’s picked up as I have been meaning to clean the carpets for ages . Now we have baby and dogs in the house it saves a lot of money as well as can clean deep stain messes up straight awake.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo
